## Matrix interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Matrix<S> extends LinearTransformation<Vector<S>, Vector<S>> 
```

|  [scalarMultiply(scalar)](./vector.matrix.scalarmultiply.md) | Implements multiplication of a matrix by a scalar |
|  [set(rowIndex, columnIndex, value)](./vector.matrix.set.md) | Returns a \*new\* matrix equal to the old one, except with the entry at <code>(rowIndex, columnIndex)</code> replaced with <code>value</code> |
